name: Cart32 Shopping Cart
author: Cart32 Dev Team, Lead by Bryan Whitaker

sections.description:
Cart32 is very easy to use online e-commerce software

  • This plug-in connects to your Cart32 account or allows you to create a new account if you do not have one.
  • You can then easily add a products to your pages and posts.
  • The Cart32 shopping cart automatically keeps the same look and feel of your WordPress site.

About Cart32

Cart32 has 17+ hears experience in helping people sell online. The software is extremely easy to use and it allows for customization into your current website or blog.

Features include:

  • Flexible tax and shipping
  • Discounts and gift certificates
  • One page checkout
  • Built in payment gateway with a Cart32 Merchant Account
  • Support for PayPal, Amazon and over 50 different payment gateways
  • Many, many more feature ….

Find out more at Cart32.com
sections.installation:
1. Install the Cart32 for WordPress Plug-In
  2. Create a new Cart32 account or connect the plug-in to your existing account
  3. Add products to your posts and pages.

2.0

  • Completely new Cart32 WordPress plugin.
  • Get it now!

short_description: Allows you to easily and quickly connect your Cart32 Shopping Cart to Wordpress.
